title: SCOTUS Tackles Illegal File Sharing, Internet Music Piracy, and Copyright Law
description: The Supreme Court heard arguments this week in a case with far-reaching implications for how millions of Americans use the internet.
content: Greetings and welcome to another edition of Injustice System. Before we dig into the legal news, I wanted to let you know that Reason's annual webathon is currently underway. If you find this newslet… [+4039 chars]
